Elevator

Table
Furniture.Description: Put stuff on it and chairs around it

Glass Table

Furniture.Description: Uncomfortable plastic chair

Office Chair

Couch

Furniture.Name: Small Heater
Small Heater
Furniture.Description: Humble heating unit for your basic office needs

Furniture.Name: Ceiling Fan
Ceiling Fan
Furniture.Description: Nifty ceiling fan, which not only looks cool, but also cools down the room! May cause noise pollution.

Furniture.Name: Radiator
Radiator
Furniture.Description: Runs on expensive district heating, but is a lot more effective than a small heater.

Furniture.Name: Ventilation
Ventilation
Furniture.Description: Small ventilation unit that takes air directly from the other side of a wall. Can be cranked up to super cool rooms with servers.

Furniture.Name: Central Heating
Central Heating
Furniture.Description: Industrial strength central heating unit to heat up entire buildings. Very noisy and very ugly.

Furniture.Name: AC Unit
AC Unit
Furniture.Description: Industrial strength air conditioning unit to cool down entire building complexes. Extremely noisy and ugly, and has to be placed above ground.

Old Computer
Furniture.Description: More pixels than you can count on one hand!

Modern Computer

Furniture.Name: HoloComputer
HoloComputer
Furniture.Description: Welcome to the future! Where everything is a little less convenient

Lamp

Fridge

Instant Coffee
